mapper.select: SELECT ITM_NO, ITM_NAME, ITM_CONTENT, ITM_PRICE, ITM_QTY, ITM_IMG1, ITM_IMG2, ITM_IMG3, ITM_DATE FROM V1_ITEM ORDER BY ITM_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO V1_ITEM VALUES(#{itm_no}, #{itm_name}, #{itm_content}, #{itm_price}, #{itm_qty}, #{itm_img1, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{itm_img2, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{itm_img3, jdbcType=BLOB}, SYSDATE)
